name: Getting to Pluto
description:
You play as a lonely space captian trying to get to Pluto. You must survive 7 levels to see what Pluto has in store for you!

One thing we do know is it's going to be a spicey adventure!

Few gameplay tips:

  • You need to lock enemies to be able to shoot.
  • Keep up your transversal.
  • Controls are mouse clicks to interact with the HUD and objects in space.

This was made by a solo developer for Godot Wild Jam #31 and was their first game using Godot.

The theme was Something's Missing which in this case it's the theme.

All 3 wildcards are in use:

  • Oregano - Add Oregano to your game. Everything is better with oregano.
  • You wot m8? - Ignore the theme completely.
  • Duck, Duck, Moose - Have 1 object in your game that is of an entirely different art style.

Big thank you to Daniel Linssen for his m5x7 pixel art font which you can find at  https://managore.itch.io/m5x7
